results.abstract: People who would not be allowed anywhere near the battlefield in a U.S.-led war are active on the Ukrainian front, with ready access to American weapons.

media.caption: A raucous demonstration erupted in Tel Aviv late Sunday after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed the defense minister and his government pressed on with a judicial overhaul.

results.title: Twitter Says Parts of Its Source Code Were Leaked Online
results.abstract: The leak adds to the challenges facing the Elon Musk-owned company, which is trying to identify the person responsible and any other people who downloaded the code.

media.caption: According to a legal filing by Twitter, parts of the company’s source code had been posted on GitHub, an online collaboration platform for software developers.
